name: Chance The Wiz
description:
This is the first game I have ever even gotten close to completing.

Chance The Wiz: a dungeon action game about Chance, a wizard with magical dice that, when rolled, conjure various attacks and powers.

If you get two or more of a kind of faces on your roll, you activate that ability.

Move with WASD, roll your dice with SpaceBar, and aim your wand with the mouse!

(I have never even so much as touched an instrument in my life, so if you hate my awful attempt at music, there is a button to turn it off)
